column4: i just removed 'gnome-games' which uninstalled 'gnome-desktop-environment' but now apt wants to uninstall hundrets of packages too...
i don't know if it is okay to uninstall all these packages. some of them sounds like i still need them.
don't remove them . you'can't remove some apps with uninstalling the whole desktop
are you using software center od apt ?
answer no , if it's asking if you want to remove those packages
yeah, everything is fine again, but isn't there a way to uninstall or hide the games!?
now install the gnome-desktop-environment , because if you don't, on the next boot you won't have a desktop
hope you installed the desktop like I suggested
apt-get is not mentioning any packages
the commands aren't entirely finished until the next reboot , sort of like windows update
